column4: anyone good with proxies? can some one help me with this problem http://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=45086
i cannot set the proxy for googlechromium
I believe it obeys the http_proxy and ftp_proxy   variables
chromium has proxy settings in the under the hood section
what do you mean by hood section?, when i open the proxy settings in chrome it refers to a page saying its set in the os, a thing that doesn't come up when im not using linux
click the spanner on the right -> options -> under the hood tab
yes, and then i as i click change proxysettings i get refered to about:linux-proxy-configuration
yes, and then i as i click change proxysettings i get refered to about:linux-proxy-config *
i'm using the daily build and can manually set proxies in there
how do i apt-get the daily build of chrome?
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:chromium-daily/ppa; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get upgrade
add-apt-repository is not a valid command
are you not on karmic / lucid?
irrelevant, your distro is not supported here
if you expect support from the official channel you need to have an official release from canonical
